title: Kumquat jam
ingredients: ['1kg kumquats, washed', '1 litre water', '1kg sugar (plain, not jam suagr)', 'Tools', 'large saucepan', 'wooden spoon', 'small piece muslin cloth', 'kitchen string', '4 clean glass jars, sterilised in the oven at 100 C, when your sugar is added', 'small saucer, placed in the freezer']
